name: blorg_1987 VS Charlie Kid
description:
Blorg_1987 Vs Charlie kid is a game made for an italian youtuber who hates chalie kid 

commands:

Keybord: left(s) right(d) jump (space) shoot(left click) crouch(shift)

gamepad: left(left analog left) right(rigth analog left) jump (a) shoot(lL) crouch(left analog clicked)
